name: YANG Guan
research interest: Dr. Yang specializes in the areas of swine immunology, infectious disease, and vaccinology. He is also an expert in mouse immunology focused on using mouse models to study autoimmune diseases. His program is divided into two main research areas. The first involves phenotypically and functionally characterizing porcine innate-like T lymphocytes during different microbial infections. Dr. Yang's other area of research is in the field of autoimmunity, focused on evaluating the role of environmental factors such as intestinal microbiota in the development of autoimmune responses.
